00016 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cMCAWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00017 {
00018   string histName = fHistNameBase;
00019   int iHist=1;
00020   while(gDirectory->Get(histName.data()) != NULL) {
00021     histName = Form("%s%02d", fHistNameBase.data(), iHist);
00022     iHist++;
00023   }
00024 
00025   string histTitle = "MCA Spectrum";
00026 
00027   int nBins = 32768;
00028 
00029   // this histogram is deallocated when the file is closed
00030   TH1D* fHistogram = new TH1D(histName.data(), histTitle.data(), nBins, 0, nBins);
00031  
00032   for(int iROOTBin = 1; iROOTBin <= nBins; iROOTBin++) {
00033     fHistogram->SetBinContent(iROOTBin, fMCADecoder->IthBinOf(record, iROOTBin-1));
00034   }
00035 
00036   fHistogram->Write();
00037   
00038   return kSuccess;
00039 }
